sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app.app
  .youtube-app-container
    youtube-configurator(:placeholder="placeholder"
      :label="label"
      @onSubmit="onSubmit"
      @toggle-switch="onToggleSwitch").configurator
    youtube-video(:videoId="videoId"
      :autoPause="autoPause").video
    v-switch(v-model="isDebuggerOn"
      label="debugger"
      color="red"
      :class="{activated: isDebuggerOn}").switch-style
    v-switch(v-model="joe"
      label="another one"
      color="indigo"
      :class="{activated: joe}").switch-style
    debug-panel(v-if="isDebuggerOn")
</template>

<script>
import YoutubeVideo from './components/YoutubeVideo.vue'
import YoutubeConfigurator from './components/YoutubeConfigurator.vue'
import DebugPanel from './components/DebugPanel.vue'
import { videoIdParser } from './utility/parser'
import { validateVideoId } from './utility/validator/youtube-video-validation'
import { YOUTUBE_API_CODES } from './constants/constants'
import { useItemStore } from './store/item'
import { usePlaylistStore } from './store/playlist'
import { VSwitch } from 'vuetify/components'
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    YoutubeVideo,
    YoutubeConfigurator,
    DebugPanel,
    VSwitch
  },
  data() {
    return {
      autoPause: false,
      label: 'Enter a URL or video ID',
      placeholder: 'ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_83LZ79VMLg&ab_channel=MrMoMMusic',
      isDebuggerOn: false,
      joe: false

    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(input) {
      const videoId = videoIdParser(input)
      validateVideoId(videoId).then((status) => {
        if (status === YOUTUBE_API_CODES.VALID) {
          this.videoId = videoId
        }
      })
    },
    onToggleSwitch(isDebuggerOn) {
      this.autoPause = isDebuggerOn
      const store = useItemStore()
      store.doShit()
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentSong']),
    videoId() {
      return this.currentSong.videoId
    }
  },
  watch: {
    joe() {
      // const playStore = usePlaylistStore()
      // playStore.syncPlaylist()
      // playStore.changeSong()
      // const {videoId} = playStore.getCurrentSong
      // this.videoId = videoId
    },
    isDebuggerOn() {

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-app-container {
  @include flex-column();

  .configurator {
    margin-bottom: 30px;
  }

  .video {
    margin: 15px;
  }
}

.switch-style {
  color: red;
  font-family: copperplate;

  &.activated {
    color: blue;
    font-family: papyrus;
  }
}

.youtube-app-container {
  @include flex-column();
}
</style>
<style lang="scss">
// * {
//   background-image: url('assets/images/pinkStreets.jpg');
//   background-size: cover;
//   // background-repeat: no-repeat, repeat;
//   background-attachment: fixed;
// }
</style>
